Articles.Content:
Can telemetry be added to multiplayer games？

Similar to these modules：

https://github.com/TeleIO/Telemachus-1

https://www.curseforge.com/kerbal/ksp-mods/kerbal-telemetry

but it is made for in-game，not web

It is better to realize the telemetry of the LAN while implementing the telemetry of the multiplayer game, so that I can control my ship with other electronic devices at home

Edited January 11, 2023 by Junyi Dong
Improve information
